name: Magenta World Demo
description:
This is a brief (and incomplete) glimpse at the world of Magenta, an upcoming Stealth-Action game.  Take a walk around an upper-city tenement block as the priests of Hevran make their mid-morning rounds, and enjoy a vista of the lulled city.

Stay tuned for a future gameplay prototype of Magenta, ideally releasing before the end of this Summer.
